My Current events account. [Gen X]
News Topic i care about and pieces of information to delve deeper.

Be an Observer of History cause people (oppressors & their supporters) will Gaslight you that it is not happening or did not happen Now and in the Future. We know "The Deniers" Playbook.

To join protests check with your local Human Rights groups in your Country/City.

Pick a server that suits you at https://joinmastodon.org
